DjoloxSmall N1L3 tutorial

The link is not working.

here you go

shouldve deleted the "href" part
Yes. Thanks!

still not working

how it can be local trouble? Does that means no Soviet Pack?

Nothing useful in tutorial

and i didn't understand bobcat what he said

Edited October 10, 2013 by shadowsutekh
No double posts please! The edit button exists for a reason!

Nothing useful in tutorial

Yes, I always do a useless guide and tutorials. Dont look them.

please explain better what do you mean in your post and can i already download mod or i need to download romfarer or what?

but is there solution... or not

in earlier versions it worked fine

stupid spaceport lol

cant wait spaceport 2 hope they will fix it

Edited October 10, 2013 by shadowsutekh
No double posts please! The edit button exists for a reason!

You can download the mod from Kerbal Spaceport already. Bobcat posted it 2 pages ago. I'd suggest for everyone to don't use ASAS during Block A burning scince it is highly unstable. The rest works fine with ASAS on.

Look at the situation.

Some people download the file and they all works fine.

Other people (and you're one of them)can not download or open the file.

How do you think what could be the problem? In my pack archive? Or KSPSP ? Or somthing else? I dont know.

but is there solution... or not

It's a known problem with Spaceport. Not a thing BobCat can do about it. I've never had a problem with it. Others have tried using a download manager, so you can test your luck there.

Anyway, this latest update looks amazing! Can't wait to get it loaded and flying.
please stop double posting. thanks.
Until Spaceport 2.0 these things will be with us. Sometimes addons won't start to download for me either but it's rare.
sorry for double posting i don't say everything i want want so i double post

Thanks Bobcat for this fascinating vehicle, i always wondered what it would look like in action!

(and i for one like your tutorials, they include every information that is needed!)

Thank you very much for your support.

In fact, community support is one of the few things that are keeping me motivated to do that either
I really like the engine shrouds. Professional work I have to say (the entire rocket).

sorry for double posting i don't say everything i want want so i double post

If you don't get to say everything you want to say, use the edit button. It's very annoying when people multi-post.
Bobcat, please notify us next time you remove parts from the pack, it sucks having to rebuild and relaunch several rockets when an updated parts pack is released.

Thank you very much for your support.

In fact, community support is one of the few things that are keeping me motivated to do that either

Well, in this case you should expect a crapload of appreciation in the next few days because what you've done with N1-L3 is FANTASTIC! Keep up the good work and Kod bless you

You think N1 could do an interplanetary flyby of some sort? Duna/ Eve?. Bobcat, I must commend you on your excellent work on the details in these parts, whatever you've done optimization wise has also helped loads, I can run it on my moms crapbook pro. 11/10!. Be sure to check my what if thread for an updated soviet mars mission what if using the N1 parts!

Thank you very much for your support.

In fact, community support is one of the few things that are keeping me motivated to do that either

Bobcat, the amount of time and effort you put in to these mods gets my utmost respect. People like you are what adds an element to this game above just building and blowing stuff up. I love the historical accuracy and attention to detail, and can't wait to get home and give the N1 a test drive!!!
You said about adding MAKS and Mrya into game in next update huh? Why you don't try adding MiG Spiral spaceplane? It's very nice.

I think the gimbal range for Block A is way too much. 1 seems to be too high value for 7300 kn thrust. I could do a nice gravity turn with 0.1 so N1 was really stable that way but maybe it doesn't need to be that low either.
Thank you SO much for the N1.
the one bad thing i noticed is the SAS is almost usless on every thing i try to fly.
Fantastic work as always, BobCat. Thanks so much for everything you do!
